column1: The Paar is a river of Bavaria
column3: a right tributary of the Danube. For several tens of kilometers it flows parallel to the Lech
column4: at only a few km distance. Near Augsburg
column5: the Paar leaves the Lech valley and turns north-east towards Ingolstadt. It flows into the Danube near Vohburg. Towns and municipalities along the Paar include Egling
